page.title: 16THE BEAU DESERT GOLF CLUB
page.content: {The Beau Desert Golf Club}is an established club for members and visitors. It has 350 men,35 lady,25 junior and 36 house members.They employ a professional to help members to improve their play.The course has 18 holes totalling 5,747 metres in length and it is surrounded by the forest of {Cannock Chase}.It is a hilly course having bunkers,bushes and small trees as obstacles. Besides the members the club receives around 4,000 visitors each year. House members can use the restaurant and bar facilities at the club and there is also a shop selling golfing equipment. The club began in 1921 and annual membership fees are 230 pounds. The course has received some famous people such as Edward,Prince of Wales, Lord Dudley and the Earl of Newport.
